name: Nakneg Hall
description: You push through a strange force that keeps the water at bay to find yourself at the entrance to a brilliant red palace. Though no light from the surface can reach this deep underwater, giant schools of glowing fish and jellyfish illuminate the whole complex as if it were day. To the right there is a large docks, straight ahead is a large marketplace.

name: Rusterak Docks
description: You enter the docks of the palace. Wooden walkways lead outward to the edge of the water. There are groups of hunters going out and others returning with hauls of glowing fish. From the looks of it, they'll take just about anybody on a hunting trip.

name: Manihoj Market
description: Manihoj is the largest marketplace under the sea, if you believe the signage. There are many shops here, mostly consisting of bulk goods. Most places seem to accept gold pieces, though a few only trade via Sashcom Scales. A station in the corner appears to be open for anyone skilled at lapidary.

buildings.name: Sulmenkan Local Goods
buildings.description: The sizeable stall sells a variety of locally made Sulmenkan products. Most of them are of no use to you, but you notice a few helpful items in a case behind the counter.

buildings.name: Hunted Wares
buildings.description: A small and smelly market stall sits in the corner of the plaza. There's a pile of every kind of dead animal, some tanned and some apparently still fresh.

buildings.name: Fin's Fine Fabrics
buildings.description: A small and smelly market stall sits in the corner of the plaza. There's a pile of every kind of dead animal, some tanned and some apparently still fresh.
